org.apache.hama.ml.perception

Class SmallMultiLayerPerceptron

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.ml.perception.MultiLayerPerceptron
      • org.apache.hama.ml.perception.SmallMultiLayerPerceptron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public final class SmallMultiLayerPerceptron
extends MultiLayerPerceptron
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    SmallMultiLayerPerceptronBSP is a kind of multilayer perceptron whose parameters can be fit into the memory of a single machine. This kind of model can be trained and used more efficiently than the BigMultiLayerPerceptronBSP, whose parameters are distributedly stored in multiple machines. In general, it it is a multilayer perceptron that consists of one input layer, multiple hidden layer and one output layer. The number of neurons in the input layer should be consistent with the number of features in the training instance. The number of neurons in the output layer
